Class RMIClientConnImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.rmi.RMIObservable<VCAbstractMessage>
      • it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.rmi.RMIClientConnImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIClientConnection, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIClientConnImpl
extends RMIObservable<VCAbstractMessage>
implements RMIClientConnection
    Class that implements the remote interface for the server
    Author:
    Pietro Ghiglio

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(MVAbstractMessage message)
        Method that sends a MVAbstractMessage by remote-calling the notify method of the client. If a RemoteException is throws while calling the notify() method, the server will start handling the disconnection.
        Specified by:
        send in interface RMIClientConnection
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(java.lang.String playerName,
                          RMIServerConnection clientService)
                   throws UserNameTakenException,
                          GameStartedException
        Method called by the remote client in order to add a player to the game.
        Specified by:
        handleRequest in interface RMIClientConnection
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        clientService - the client's remote interface
        Throws:
        UserNameTakenException - if the username is already taken
        GameStartedException - if a game is already started and the requesting client is not reconnecting.
